progression_balancing.description:
A system that can move progression earlier, to try and prevent the player from getting stuck and bored early.
A lower setting means more getting stuck. A higher setting means less getting stuck.

accessibility.description:
Set rules for reachability of your items/locations.
Locations: ensure everything can be reached and acquired.
Items: ensure all logically relevant items can be acquired.
Minimal: ensure what is needed to reach your goal can be acquired.

priority_locations.description: Prevent these locations from having an unimportant item

auto_equip.description: Automatically equips any received armor or left/right weapons.

lock_equip.description:
Lock the equipment slots so you cannot change your armor or your left/right weapons. Works great with the
Auto-equip option.

no_weapon_requirements.description:
Disable the weapon requirements by removing any movement or damage penalties.
Permitting you to use any weapon early

randomize_weapons_level.description:
Enable this option to upgrade a percentage of the pool of weapons to a random value between the minimum and
maximum levels defined.
all: All weapons are eligible, both basic and epic
basic: Only weapons that can be upgraded to +10
epic: Only weapons that can be upgraded to +5

randomize_weapons_percentage.description: The percentage of weapons in the pool to be upgraded if randomize weapons level is toggled

min_levels_in_5.description: The minimum upgraded value of a weapon in the pool of weapons that can only reach +5

max_levels_in_5.description: The maximum upgraded value of a weapon in the pool of weapons that can only reach +5

min_levels_in_10.description: The minimum upgraded value of a weapon in the pool of weapons that can reach +10

max_levels_in_10.description: The maximum upgraded value of a weapon in the pool of weapons that can reach +10

late_basin_of_vows.description:
Force the Basin of Vows to be located as a reward of defeating Pontiff Sulyvahn. It permits to ease the
progression by preventing having to kill the Dancer of the Boreal Valley as the first boss

no_spell_requirements.description: Disable the spell requirements permitting you to use any spell

no_equip_load.description: Disable the equip load constraint from the game

death_link.description: When you die, everyone dies. Of course the reverse is true too.
